procurement_category: Goods and services procurement for a specific project or program
short_summary: The Government of Canada's Department of National Defence requires virtual joint terminal attack controllers for a training system for its forward air control courses. This is a public procurement process for a fixed-term contract to provide both program and project services.
description: Virtual Joint Terminal Attack Controller (JTAC) Training System contract
duration_in_months: ), est sélectionné parallèlement à la phases de la réorganisation en cours
